header.title: Journalists gathered on Inclusive Journalism | Sámi University of Applied Sciences

body.p: Inclusive Journalism Seminar at Sámi University College.

Seminar and workshops are held today and tomorrow at Sámi University College, Diehtosiidda, Guovdageaidnu. Lectures and guests are gathered from Australia, Brazil, Denmark, England, Finland, Kenya, Nederlands, New Zeland, Norway, Sweden and USA.
Lia Markelin. Photo: Máhtte Sikku Valio
Inclusive Journalism Seminar at Sámi University College. Photo: Máhtte Sikku Valio
Associate Proffessor Lia Markelin. Photo: Máhtte Sikku Valio

p.em: in cooperation with the Swedish School of Social Science, University of Helsinki
and the Inclusive Journalism Initiative Network – Reporting Europe and Asia Pacific
